reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Dialogue on possibilities for conflict resolution in Afghanistan

description.narrative: The international community is withdrawing the majority of its military presence from Afghanistan and a political solution to the conflict is sought. In this context CMI works to promote citizens? participation in the peace process by providing opportuniti es for different groups to express their views on the future of the country. In Mazar-e-Sharif Northern Afghanistan CMI supports a group of independent civil society actors to initiate discussions and dialogue among civil society academia women groups and media about the causes drivers and consequences of the conflict and more importantly the prospects for peace. The views and proposals developed by this group will be advocated both to the political decision-makers and among the general public both inside a nd outside Afghanistan.
